_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

InstructionForReturns.description: A document used to initiate a return of goods. The producer is requesting the return of products that are not selling well, either to use in other places or to free up rack or shelf space.

InstructionForReturns.title: Instruction For Returns. Details
InstructionForReturns.description: A document used to initiate a return of goods. The producer is requesting the return of products that are not selling well, either to use in other places or to free up rack or shelf space.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Instruction For Returns. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Instruction For Returns. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Instruction For Returns. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Instruction For Returns. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Instruction For Returns. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Instruction For Returns. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Instruction For Returns. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Instruction For Returns. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Instruction For Returns. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Instruction For Returns. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

DocumentReference.title: Instruction For Returns. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to another document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Instruction For Returns. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

SellerSupplierParty.title: Instruction For Returns. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

RetailerCustomerParty.title: Instruction For Returns. Retailer_ Customer Party. Customer Party

ManufacturerParty.title: Instruction For Returns. Manufacturer_ Party. Party

InstructionForReturnsLine.title: Instruction For Returns. Instruction For Returns Line
InstructionForReturnsLine.description: A line providing details about one type of article to be returned.
